Articles.Content: Anyone knows if we will have rovers on future updates? Thanks.
[mod]Please keep new suggestions out of the official development thread[/mod]
I hope so. it would be quite good to have a rover building assembly or something similar, and then be able to take the rovers up in cargo bays i thought.
There are plenty of cart mods, but a stock rover would be nice.

There are plenty of cart mods, but a stock rover would be nice.

Yes, there is a good one called the cart mod.

but, you can already make your own rovers with the wheels. 8)
Do they move without a rocket engine? ;P

What would be their propulsion?

I suppose You could go thw way of the mars rover with the solar panels, apperently that could 'go on forever' because it never ran out of energy(except for nighttime)

What would be their propulsion?

I suppose You could go thw way of the mars rover with the solar panels, apperently that could 'go on forever' because it never ran out of energy(except for nighttime)
Spadde, I think that if you\'re going to post a picture from another site, you should reference it. Even if everyone else knows it\'s from http://xkcd.com/695/

This thread really would be better suited in General Discussion, seeing as it isn\'t actually a [suggestion] to the developers. just a question followed by general discussion.

I\'m going to move it, carry on talking about it though, I\'d like to see little rovers as cargo on our craft.

Yes, there is a good one called the cart mod.

but, you can already make your own rovers with the wheels. 8)

Eeeeh, could you elaborate more on that remark (I would love to build my own rover)
Spadde, that is the saddest story ever. Poor rover only wanted to go home, and he did his job the best he could.

Spadde, that is the saddest story ever. Poor rover only wanted to go home, and he did his job the best he could.

I KNOW!!! God dam, i feel sad! no joke! :\'(
